sqlMap.select: select top 200 convert(varchar(4),#intYear#)+'-'+convert(varchar(2),#intMonth#)+'-'+convert(varchar(2),#intDay#)+' '+convert(varchar(2),#intHour#)+':00'+'|' + sourceTable.vccgi +'|'+dtbGroupTree.vcDimensName +'|'+convert(varchar(15),isnull(count(distinct(sourceTable.nmImsi)),0) )+'|'+ convert(varchar(15),isnull(sum(sourceTable.intAppUpFlush+sourceTable.intAppDownFlush),0) ) from $sourceTableName$ sourceTable inner join dtbGroupTree on sourceTable.ProductDimens = dtbGroupTree.nmDimensId where sourceTable.vccgi = #idColumnName# and dtbGroupTree.nmTypeId = 1 and dtbGroupTree.nmLevelsId = 2 group by sourceTable.vccgi,dtbGroupTree.vcDimensName,intRaitype order by isnull(count(distinct(sourceTable.nmImsi)),0) desc, isnull(sum(sourceTable.intAppUpFlush+sourceTable.intAppDownFlush),0) desc

$option$ select convert(varchar(19),dtEndTime),nmMsisdn,vcWapUrl from $sourceTableName$ where intApnTypeId = 1 and vcWapUrl <> '' and dtEndTime >= convert(datetime,#startTime#) and dtEndTime < convert(datetime,#endTime#)
